item.description: [...] about this presentation that appealed to me? Not quite sure there either. I took some notes for the Web 2.0 Ireland blog and gave my reaction there. I also took about 90 seconds while David was talking to turn [...]

item.title: By: Mark Cross
item.dc:creator: Mark Cross
item.description:
Conor,
Why not offer dual login in? Those that will, will, those that don't - won't.
item.content:encoded:
Conor,

Why not offer dual login in? Those that will, will, those that don’t – won’t.

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: I'm a fan of it in principle and use it all the time but I see a huge problem in getting average punters to use it. We've delayed implementing it on LouderVoice twice now for that very reason.
item.content:encoded: I’m a fan of it in principle and use it all the time but I see a huge problem in getting average punters to use it. We’ve delayed implementing it on LouderVoice twice now for that very reason.
